taskDescription: Reluctantly agrees to try ALFRED’s cognitive games after caregiver suggestion
Insists that no personal data be shared with anyone including caregiver, family, or medical staff
Demands all communication with ALFRED be formal and only initiated by explicit activation
Starts a simple memory game on ALFRED while explicitly avoiding difficult challenges
Prefers silence and minimal interaction from ALFRED once game starts
Avoids engaging in social or video interactions via ALFRED
Expresses stubbornness and skepticism towards technology through clipped, formal commands
Seeks to retain full control over when and how ALFRED is used
Responds to ALFRED's gentle reminders to drink fluids and eat balanced meals
Activates ALFRED's voice assistant only when needed to avoid unsolicited interactions
Manages her privacy settings to prevent data sharing with caregivers
Dismissing reminders from ALFRED that feel intrusive
Prefers to confirm hydration and meal intake offline without system involvement
Expresses a desire for minimal explanations from ALFRED during interactions
Avoids video check-ins initiated via ALFRED in favor of private conversations
Experiences wariness and skepticism about technology and data privacy
Engages selectively with social activity suggestions to avoid feeling pressured
Uses ALFRED to send formal and polite messages to family and friends
Interrupts ALFRED to correct the phrasing or tone of outgoing messages
Uses ALFRED's push-to-talk feature to send measured responses to daughter's texts
Avoids mentioning health or mood in communications sent via ALFRED
Dismisses most notifications related to physical or cognitive exercises
Rejects ALFRED’s suggestions for social activities or games
Experiences relief that ALFRED respects boundaries but feels isolated
Prefers the system to avoid challenging or emotionally taxing interactions
Dismisses cognitive game notifications upon arrival
Customizes ALFRED settings to block all app installations
Experiences frustration and isolation due to strict technology boundaries
Monitors and controls ALFRED’s privacy settings rigorously
Prefers offline visits or phone calls over digital check-ins
Requests ALFRED to provide medication or appointment reminders only upon explicit prompting
Wears health sensors as reluctantly agreed after caregiver's insistence
Responds minimally to ALFRED’s prompts for health measurements such as blood pressure
Blocks most notifications from ALFRED to maintain privacy
Answers messages curtly and insists on formal communication only
Manually confirms medication intake to ALFRED
Refuses to wear sensor-laden wearables due to privacy concerns
Experiences skepticism and guarded hope towards ALFRED’s capabilities
Feels more in control yet isolated due to cautious approach to technology
Checks public bus schedules by asking ALFRED for specific times
Declines reminders to drink water when offered by ALFRED
Tests ALFRED’s compliance by asking if data has been shared or apps installed without consent
Maintains a formal and polite communication style with the assistant
Feels relief when ALFRED confirms no data sharing but remains uneasy about technology
Prefers minimal digital interaction and avoids casual or familiar phrasing from ALFRED
Dismiss notifications about challenging exercises and video check-ins
Maintain a minimal and familiar ALFRED configuration
Prioritize simplicity and low technological complexity in interactions
Monitor system interactions cautiously to prevent intrusions
Expresses wariness and discomfort toward new technology during setup
Feels overwhelmed by conflicting caregiver priorities during setup
